name: Rise and Fall (itch) (imaginarystudios)
description:
Rise and fall is a game in which your goal is to stay on screen. There to help you are many blocks that rise up from the bottom of the screen, but you have to jump ship before they take you too far!

The result is an endless game of finding the balance between falling and rising. Use the arrow keys to apply impulses to your character (or A/D) and see how long you can make it!
